DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ( 15-subject prospective case series ) examine effect Activator Methods technique decrease A1c level patient type II Diabetes Mellitus ( aka adult-onset diabetes ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible participate study age 3060 clinically diagnose Type II diabetes primary care provider endocrinologist ( diagnosis usually base FPG > 126 mg/dL two occasion ) . Participants must diagnose least one year currently medical supervision disease . They must also A1c measurement 7 % , indicate less optimal management disease . The study exclude pregnant woman ; comorbidities affect life expectancy ( e.g . malignancy , CVD ) ; uncontrolled hypertension ( > 150/100 mmHg ) ; serious trauma ( e.g . MVA ) within previous 12 month ; diagnose bleeding/clotting disorder ; currently chiropractic care contraindication Activator care ( e.g . vertebral fracture , infection , active inflammatory arthritis , severe osteoporosis ) . The presence exclusion determine history exam procedure . All female subject ask take precaution participation study avoid become pregnant .
